name: crawler
description: a go at a web crawler!

scripts.start: npm run build && node build/index.js crawler
scripts.start:crawl: npm run build && DEBUG=crawler,crawler:work,page,storage node build/index.js crawl
scripts.start:indices: npm run build && DEBUG=indices node build/index.js updateIndices
scripts.start:images: npm run build && DEBUG=learn node build/index.js collectImages
scripts.start:text: npm run build && DEBUG=learn,worker:texter node build/index.js collectText
scripts.start:summarize: npm run build && DEBUG=learn node build/index.js summarizeText
scripts.start:sentiment: npm run build && DEBUG=learn node build/index.js addSentiment
scripts.start:tf: npm run build && DEBUG=learn node build/index.js addTermFrequencies
scripts.start:tf-split: npm run build && DEBUG=learn node build/index.js splitTerms
scripts.start:tags: npm run build && DEBUG=learn node build/index.js addPageTags
scripts.start:spa: npm run build && DEBUG=learn,page node build/index.js testSPA
scripts.start:classifyImages: npm run build && DEBUG=learn,page node build/index.js classifyImages
scripts.start:combineImages: npm run build && DEBUG=reconfigure node build/index.js combineImages
scripts.start:categorizeText: npm run build && DEBUG=reconfigure node build/index.js categorizeText
scripts.start:createSites: npm run build && DEBUG=reconfigure node build/index.js createSites

author: Joe D'Alessandro
